Module algoDataWPO
Package be.vub.ansanche.project

Interface GroceryStoreInterface

    GroceryStore

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        void addProduct​(java.lang.String department,
                java.lang.String name,
                float price,
                int barcodeId,
                int count)
        Adds a product to the store
        Parameters:
        department - - represents a department to which is the product added
        name - - represents the name of the new product
        price - - represents the price of the new product
        barcodeId - - is the bar-code number of the new product
        count - - is the number of items of the new product in the store

      • addFreshProduct

        void addFreshProduct​(java.lang.String name,
                     float pricePerKg,
                     int barcodeId,
                     float amountInKg)
        Adds a fresh product to the store
        Parameters:
        name - - represents the name of the new fresh product
        pricePerKg - - represents the price of the new fresh product
        barcodeId - - is the bar-code number of the new fresh product (identifying only the type)
        amountInKg - - is the amount in kilograms the new fresh product in the store

      • addClient

        int addClient​(java.lang.String name)
        Registers a new client in the store
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the client
        Returns:
        a unique id number identifying the client

      • addToBasket

        void addToBasket​(int barcodeId,
                 int count,
                 int customerId)
        Adds a product to the basket for a specific client. Make sure you adjust the amount of the product that is available at the store for others.
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product that is added to the basket
        count - - number of the packages of the product that is added to the basket
        customerId - - the client id that is adding the product to the basket

      • removeFromBasket

        void removeFromBasket​(int barcodeId,
                      int count,
                      int customerId)
        Removes a product to the basket for a specific client. Make sure you adjust the amount of the product that is available at the store for others.
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product that is removed added from the basket
        count - - number of the packages of the product that is removed from the basket
        customerId - - the client id that is removing the product from the basket

      • printBasket

        void printBasket​(int customerId)
        Prints the content of a basket for a specific client
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id whose basket will be printed out

      • computeBasketPrice

        float computeBasketPrice​(int customerId)
        Computes the total price of the basket for a specific client
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id whose basket will be printed out
        Returns:
        total price of products in the basket

      • requestFreshProduct

        void requestFreshProduct​(int barcodeId,
                         float amount,
                         int customerId)
        Requests an amount in kg of the fresh product. If the request is successful, it is automatically added to the basket.
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the fresh product that is requested by the client
        amount - - amount in kilograms that is requested by the client
        customerId - - the client id of the client making the request

      • serveNextRequest

        boolean serveNextRequest()
        Processes the next request in the queue. If the request can be produces then it adds the product to the basket. Note: Fresh product cannot be removed from the basket. Once it is requested it has to be paid by the client
        Returns:
        true if the next request was successfully processed, false otherwise

      • printUnservedRequests

        void printUnservedRequests()
        This method will print currently unserved requests that are waiting to be processed

      • addDepartment

        void addDepartment​(java.lang.String departmentName)
        This method adds a new department to the store
        Parameters:
        departmentName - - is the name of the department that is added to the store

      • checkout

        void checkout​(int customerId)
        Checkouts specified client and prints a bill.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id of the client that checkouts the items from the basket and finalizes the purchase

      • connectDepartments

        void connectDepartments​(java.lang.String department1,
                        java.lang.String department2)
        Connecting 2 departments. Two departments are connected when there is a direct aisle between them.
        Parameters:
        department1 - - name of the first department that will be connected.
        department2 - - name of the second department that will be connected.

      • shortestPath

        void shortestPath​(java.lang.String department1,
                  java.lang.String department2)
        Prints the shortest path between 2 departments.
        Parameters:
        department1 - - name of the source department.
        department2 - - name of the destination department.

      • printShoppingHistory

        void printShoppingHistory​(int customerId)
        Prints a summary of previous purchases
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id for which the shopping history will be printed

      • addToShoppingList

        void addToShoppingList​(int barcodeId,
                       int count,
                       int customerId)
        Adds a product to the shopping list of a specific client.
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product that is added to the shopping list
        count - - number of the packages of the product that is added to the shopping list
        customerId - - the client id that is adding the product to the shopping list

      • clearShoppingList

        void clearShoppingList​(int customerId)
        Removes all items from the shopping list.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id for which the shopping list will be cleared.

      • printsOptimalPath

        void printsOptimalPath​(int customerId)
        Prints optimal path to buy all products from the shopping list
        Parameters:
        customerId - - the client id for which the shopping list will be cleared.
